messages.subject: Good bye...
messages.msgSnippet: As much as I ve gotten out of this group in the short time I ve been here, I just don t have the time for it.  It just generates way too many messages for me
messages.messageBody:
As much as I've gotten out of this group in the short time I've been here, I
just don't have the time for it. It just generates way too many messages for
me to read. I know there's a delete button I can hit, but then I end up just
deleting them all or none, because I can't really tell what will be useful
and what won't be just from the subject line. Thanks for all the support and
advice you've offered me in heading in the "right direction" twords
unschooling, I really do appreciate it! : )
Good Bye,
Sandra
Homeschooling Mom to Five


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
